comment.author: 26796236@N00
comment._content: Fitzgerald's Bar was at 6th Ave. and W 44th according to a photo in "Gotham Comes of Age: New York Through the Lens of the Byron Company, 1892-1942", By Peter Simmons, Contributor Peter Simmons, E. L. Doctorow, Published 1999.
